Articles.Content:
I would absolutely LOVE if one of the modders out there could continue [Stevie_D's IXS Warpship mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92816-NASA-IXS-Class-Warpship-and-Spacedocks-For-KSP-I-and-Stock-KSP) to work with [Boris-Barboris's KSP Interstellar Port Maintenance](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104943-0-90-KSP-Interstellar-port-maintance-thread) and 0.90. It is one of my favorite mods out there and I really want to use it in 0.90!

Sorry about this post being so short.
I actually did. Link in my sig. Not for the new Interstellar though.

> 
> I actually did. Link in my sig. Not for the new Interstellar though.

Thank...you...so...much!!!

USI Warp Drive is just as good! Maybe even better!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-27T23:04:43Z" title="03/27/2015 11:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 27, 2015</time> by SpaceLaunchSystem**
